statements: SELECT * FROM water_quality_testing_results;
SELECT site_id, test_date FROM water_quality_testing_results ORDER BY test_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM water_quality_testing_results WHERE water_ph > 7.0;
SELECT site_id, water_ph FROM water_quality_testing_results WHERE bacteria_level < 0.1;
SELECT site_id, test_date, water_ph, bacteria_level FROM water_quality_testing_results WHERE test_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM water_quality_testing_results ORDER BY site_id DESC, test_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT site_id, test_date, water_ph FROM water_quality_testing_results WHERE water_ph > 7.0 ORDER BY water_ph DESC;
SELECT AVG(water_ph) AS average_ph, MAX(bacteria_level) AS max_bacteria FROM water_quality_testing_results GROUP BY site_id;
SELECT * FROM water_quality_testing_results WHERE test_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT site_id, SUM(water_ph) AS total_ph FROM water_quality_testing_results GROUP BY site_id ORDER BY total_ph DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM water_quality_testing_sites;
SELECT site_id, site_name, location FROM water_quality_testing_sites ORDER BY site_id DESC;
SELECT site_name, location FROM water_quality_testing_sites WHERE site_id = 3;
SELECT site_name, location FROM water_quality_testing_sites WHERE location LIKE '%river%';
SELECT site_id, site_name, location FROM water_quality_testing_sites WHERE site_name = 'Lake Site';
SELECT * FROM water_quality_testing_sites ORDER BY site_id DESC;
SELECT site_name, location FROM water_quality_testing_sites WHERE site_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM test_results WHERE test_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01' ORDER BY test_date DESC;
SELECT site_name, test_type, result FROM water_quality_testing_sites JOIN test_results ON water_quality_testing_sites.site_id = test_results.site_id;
SELECT site_id, COUNT(result_id) AS total_results FROM test_results GROUP BY site_id HAVING total_results > 5;
SELECT * FROM water_quality_sites;
SELECT site_name, site_location FROM water_quality_sites;
SELECT site_name, site_location FROM water_quality_sites WHERE site_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM water_quality_tests ORDER BY test_date DESC;
SELECT site_name, test_date, test_result FROM water_quality_sites JOIN water_quality_tests ON water_quality_sites.site_id = water_quality_tests.site_id;
SELECT * FROM water_quality_sites;
SELECT site_name, site_location FROM water_quality_sites WHERE site_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM water_quality_sites ORDER BY site_name DESC;
SELECT test_date, test_result FROM water_quality_tests WHERE site_id = 2 ORDER BY test_date ASC;
SELECT parameter_name, parameter_description FROM water_quality_parameters;
SELECT * FROM WaterTestingResults WHERE testing_site = 'Site A';
SELECT testing_date, contaminant_type, contaminant_level FROM WaterTestingResults WHERE contaminant_level > 5.0 ORDER BY testing_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_tests FROM WaterTestingResults;
SELECT AVG(contaminant_level) AS avg_contaminant_level FROM WaterTestingResults WHERE testing_site = 'Site B';
SELECT * FROM WaterTestingResults WHERE testing_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM WaterTestingResults WHERE testing_site = 'Site A'
SELECT testing_date, contaminant_type FROM WaterTestingResults ORDER BY testing_date DESC
SELECT testing_id, testing_site, contaminant_level FROM WaterTestingResults WHERE contaminant_type = 'Lead' AND contaminant_level > 10
SELECT DISTINCT testing_site FROM WaterTestingResults
SELECT AVG(contaminant_level) AS average_contaminant_level FROM WaterTestingResults
SELECT * FROM WaterQualityTestingSites;
SELECT site_name, site_location FROM WaterQualityTestingSites;
SELECT site_name, site_location FROM WaterQualityTestingSites WHERE site_id = 1;
SELECT tester_name FROM Testers WHERE tester_id = 3;
SELECT testing_date, tested_parameter, test_result FROM TestResults ORDER BY testing_date DESC;
SELECT site_name, site_location FROM WaterQualityTestingSites;
SELECT tester_name, tester_email FROM Testers WHERE tester_name = 'John';
SELECT site_name, testing_date, test_result FROM TestResults WHERE testing_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT parameter_name, limit_value FROM ParameterLimits ORDER BY limit_value DESC;

SELECT site_name, test_result, result_status FROM WaterQualityTestingSites JOIN TestResults ON WaterQualityTestingSites.site_id = TestResults.site_id JOIN TestLimits ON TestResults.result_id = TestLimits.result_id AND TestResults.tested_parameter = ParameterLimits.parameter_name WHERE TestLimits.result_value > ParameterLimits.limit_value;
